com.adyen.core.interfaces

Interface PaymentRequestDetailsListener


  • public interface PaymentRequestDetailsListener
    Listener for listening to detailed events from PaymentRequest. This listener has to be implemented for advanced flow in addition to PaymentRequestListener. If the UI is required to be handled by the client application, this listener has to be implemented by the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPaymentDetailsRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest, java.util.Collection<InputDetail> inputDetails, PaymentDetailsCallback callback)
      Client is asked to provide the payment details for the selected payment method.
      void onPaymentMethodSelectionRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest, java.util.List<PaymentMethod> preferredPaymentMethods, java.util.List<PaymentMethod> availablePaymentMethods, PaymentMethodCallback callback)
      A list of payment methods is presented to the client.
      void onRedirectRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest, java.lang.String redirectUrl, UriCallback uriCallback)
      Requires a client to call the redirect URL and provide the return URI.

    • Method Detail

      • onPaymentMethodSelectionRequired

        void onPaymentMethodSelectionRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest,
                                      java.util.List<PaymentMethod> preferredPaymentMethods,
                                      java.util.List<PaymentMethod> availablePaymentMethods,
                                      PaymentMethodCallback callback)
        A list of payment methods is presented to the client. A call to PaymentMethodCallback.completionWithPaymentMethod(PaymentMethod) is expected. The selected payment method is supposed to be notified via the callback. This method is required if the client application is controlling the UI for presenting the payment methods.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - PaymentRequest instance for which the payment methods are presented.
        preferredPaymentMethods - A list of preferred PaymentMethod items.
        availablePaymentMethods - A list of available PaymentMethod items.
        callback - PaymentMethodCallback instance for notifying PaymentRequest for the method selection.

      • onRedirectRequired

        void onRedirectRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest,
                        java.lang.String redirectUrl,
                        UriCallback uriCallback)
        Requires a client to call the redirect URL and provide the return URI. If the selected payment requires a redirect, then redirect URL is sent to the client. The client is supposed to open this redirect page. When the redirected page is done with the payment, it will call the deep-link URL of the app. Then the application should notify the return URL to the SDK via the UriCallback.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - PaymentRequest reference.
        redirectUrl - Redirect URL in a string format.
        uriCallback - The callback for the client to provide the return URI.

      • onPaymentDetailsRequired

        void onPaymentDetailsRequired(PaymentRequest paymentRequest,
                              java.util.Collection<InputDetail> inputDetails,
                              PaymentDetailsCallback callback)
        Client is asked to provide the payment details for the selected payment method. This callback will only be triggered if the selected payment method requires additional details.
        Parameters:
        paymentRequest - PaymentRequest reference.
        inputDetails - The collection of InputDetail that have to be provided by the shopper.
        callback - PaymentDetailsCallback instance in order to inform PaymentRequest about the required fields. PaymentDetailsCallback needs to be called with an instance of PaymentDetails that is to be created using the InputDetail collection.
